org.openscience.cdk.tautomers

Class InChITautomerGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openscience.cdk.tautomers.InChITautomerGenerator

  • @TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.tautomers.InChITautomerGeneratorTest")
public class InChITautomerGenerator
extends Object
    Creates tautomers for a given input molecule, based on the mobile H atoms listed in the InChI. Algorithm described in [Thalheim, T. and Vollmer, A. and Ebert, R. and Kuehne, R. and Schuurmann, G., Tautomer Identification and Tautomer Structure Generation Based on the InChI Code, J. Chem. Inf. Model., 2010, 50:1223-1232].
    Provide your input molecules in Kekule form, and make sure atom type are perceived.
    When creating an input molecule by reading an MDL file, make sure to set implicit hydrogens. See the InChITautomerGeneratorTest test case.
    Author:
    Mark Rijnbeek
    Belongs to CDK module:
    tautomer
    Source code:
    master

      List<IAtomContainer> getTautomers(IAtomContainer molecule)
      Public method to get tautomers for an input molecule, based on the InChI which will be calculated by jniinchi.
      List<IAtomContainer> getTautomers(IAtomContainer inputMolecule, String inchi)
      Overloaded getTautomers(IAtomContainer) to get tautomers for an input molecule with the InChI already provided as input argument.

public List<IAtomContainer> getTautomers(IAtomContainer inputMolecule,

        Overloaded getTautomers(IAtomContainer) to get tautomers for an input molecule with the InChI already provided as input argument.

        inchi - InChI for the inpute molecule
